query: Research quantum error correction advances published in Nature, Science, or Physical Review journals during 2024. Context: Need comprehensive analysis of recent breakthroughs in quantum error correction. Goal: Identify and cite minimum 5 peer-reviewed papers with full citations (journal name, publication date, DOI). Focus areas: 1) Surface codes and topological codes, 2) Fault-tolerant quantum computing progress, 3) Experimental demonstrations and benchmarks. Success criteria: Only include published papers from Nature, Science, or Physical Review family journals; exclude preprints, blogs, news, corporate announcements; provide complete DOI for each source; prioritize 2024 publications.
